actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-402.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 270 - 124 (Record Vote No: 380).

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of H.R. 3958, a bill making appropriations for water resource development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1984, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 3958 (water resources development).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of H.R. 3958, a bill making appropriations for water resource development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1984, and for other purposes.
